en: Father took his place at the head of the table and began to say grace.
zh: 爸爸在餐桌的首位就座，然后开始祈祷。

en: My father went out just now.
zh: 我爸爸刚才出去了。

en: My father urged me to go with him.
zh: 我爸爸催促我和他一起去。

en: My father is busy just now.
zh: 我爸爸现在很忙。

en: My father is busy now.
zh: 我爸爸现在很忙。

en: My father has just come out of the bath.
zh: 我爸爸刚洗完澡出来。

en: My father lectured me for smoking.
zh: 我爸爸因为我抽烟而训斥我。

en: My father stopped smoking.
zh: 我爸爸戒烟了。

en: Father gave up cigarettes.
zh: 爸爸戒烟了。

en: My father smokes.
zh: 我爸爸抽烟。

en: My father quit smoking.
zh: 我父亲戒烟了。

en: My father neither smokes nor drinks.
zh: 我父亲既不抽烟也不喝酒。

en: My father came home just now.
zh: 我父亲刚才回家了。

en: My father cannot go without coffee even for a day.
zh: 我父亲一天都离不开咖啡。

en: My father is a heavy smoker.
zh: 我父亲烟瘾很大。

en: Father mostly plays golf on Sunday.
zh: 父亲通常星期天打高尔夫球。

en: My father usually comes home at seven.
zh: 我父亲通常七点回家。

en: The father was angry with his son for doing such a silly thing.
zh: 父亲因为儿子做了这么蠢的事情而生气。

en: Father does not eat much fruit.
zh: 父亲不怎么吃水果。

en: My father doesn't eat all that much fruit.
zh: 我父亲不怎么吃水果。

en: Dad extended his legs on the sofa.
zh: 爸爸把腿伸到沙发上。

en: My father played golf on the Sunday morning.
zh: 我父亲在星期天早上打了高尔夫球。

en: Father manages the store.
zh: 父亲管理这家商店。

en: My father manages the store.
zh: 我父亲管理这家商店。

en: Father showed him into the study.
zh: 父亲把他领进了书房。

en: My father would often read the poem aloud.
zh: 我父亲经常会大声朗读这首诗。

en: My father must do the work.
zh: 我父亲必须做这项工作。

en: My father was satisfied with the result.
zh: 我父亲对结果很满意。

en: My father holds the major interest in the corporation.
zh: 我父亲持有公司的大部分股份。

en: My father has something to do with that firm.
zh: 我父亲和那家公司有点关系。

en: Father put up the house for sale.
zh: 父亲把房子挂牌出售了。

en: My father slept through the movie.
zh: 我父亲看电影时睡着了。

en: Father was crazy about the game.
zh: 父亲对那个游戏很着迷。

en: My father made a long tear in his sleeve.
zh: 我父亲把袖子撕开了一个大口子。

en: My father is much better. He will be up and about in a week.
zh: 我父亲好多了。他一个星期内就能起床活动了。

en: My father is always getting angry.
zh: 我父亲总是生气。

en: Father scolded Junko for coming home so late.
zh: 父亲因为纯子回家太晚而责骂了她。

en: My father often takes me to baseball games.
zh: 我父亲经常带我去看棒球比赛。

en: My father used to write letters that quoted from Shakespeare.
zh: 我父亲过去写的信总是引用莎士比亚的作品。

en: My father does play golf, but not well.
zh: 我父亲确实打高尔夫球，但打得不好。

en: My father has been doing this job for twenty years.
zh: 我父亲做这份工作已经二十年了。

en: Father established his business 40 years ago.
zh: 父亲在四十年前创立了他的公司。

en: My father used to eat at this restaurant.
zh: 我父亲过去常在这家餐馆吃饭。

en: My dad bought a model plane for me for Christmas.
zh: 我爸爸圣诞节时给我买了一架模型飞机。

en: My father had once been in Greece.
zh: 我父亲曾经去过希腊。

en: My father suggested that we should go camping.
zh: 我父亲建议我们去露营。

en: My father ought to have had an operation for cancer.
zh: 我父亲本应该做癌症手术的。

en: My father died of cancer.
zh: 我父亲死于癌症。

en: My father is sweeping the garage.
zh: 我父亲正在打扫车库。

en: My father sent for the family doctor.
zh: 我父亲请了家庭医生。

en: My father is exact in money matters.
zh: 我父亲在金钱方面很严谨。

en: Father ran short of money and had to borrow some.
zh: 父亲缺钱了，不得不借一些。

en: Father named me after his aunt.
zh: 父亲以他的姑姑的名字给我命名。

en: Daddy loves to say funny things.
zh: 爸爸喜欢说有趣的事情。

en: My father is far from artistic.
zh: 我父亲一点也不懂艺术。

en: My father has been to Australia twice.
zh: 我父亲去过澳大利亚两次。

en: Father bought me the latest model motorcycle.
zh: 父亲给我买了最新款的摩托车。

en: My father is always cool.
zh: 我父亲总是很冷静。

en: My father does not always walk to work.
zh: 我父亲并不总是走路去上班。

en: My father doesn't always walk to work.
zh: 我父亲并不总是走路去上班。
